author: Erin Brady
title: Joe Biden Nominates Ketanji Brown Jackson for Supreme Court
description: If confirmed, she will become the first Black woman on the nation's highest court, the second Black justice currently on the court and the third in its history.
content:
President Joe Biden on Friday nominated Ketanji Brown Jackson to the United States Supreme Court. If confirmed, she will become the first Black woman in the court's history.
